^_.description: Any property starting with _ is valid.

authors.description: A list of people that authored the contents of the package.

dependencies.description: Dependencies are specified with a simple hash of package name to a semver compatible identifier or URL.

description.description: Help users identify and search for your package with a brief description.

devDependencies.description: Dependencies that are only needed for development of the package, e.g., test framework or building documentation.

exportsOverride.description: Used by grunt-bower-task to specify custom install locations.

homepage.description: URL to learn more about the package. Falls back to GitHub project if not specified and it's a GitHub endpoint.

ignore.description: A list of files for Bower to ignore when installing your package.

keywords.description: Used for search by keyword. Helps make your package easier to discover without people needing to know its name.

license.description: SPDX license identifier or path/url to a license.

main.description: The primary acting files necessary to use your package.

moduleType.description: The types of modules this package exposes

private.description: If you set it to  true  it will refuse to publish it. This is a way to prevent accidental publication of private repositories.

repository.description: The repository in which the source code can be found.

resolutions.description: Dependency versions to automatically resolve with if conflicts occur between packages.

title: JSON schema for Bower configuration files
